titleInfo.title: Data Publication: Sensitivity of the Polyakov loop and related observables to chiral symmetry restoration

mods.abstract: Data publication for "Sensitivity of the Polyakov loop and related observables to chiral symmetry restoration", [arXiv:2008.11678](https://arxiv.org/abs/2008.11678), [DOI: 10.1103/PhysRevD.103.L011501](https://link.aps.org/doi/10.1103/PhysRevD.103.L011501). Contains all data necessary to generate the figures of that publication.
